___options.description: Options to filter and determine which balances to return.

___currency.description: Only return balances for this currency.

___limit.description: Return at most this many balances.

___counterparty.description: Only return balances with this counterparty.

___ledgerVersion.description: Return balances as they were in this historical ledger version.

___address.description: The address of the account to get balances for.
